mapper.select: SELECT enrd_id, crs_id, mem_id, enrd_stat FROM ktds17b.enrollment_detail WHERE crs_id = #{courseId} AND mem_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ktds17b.enrollment_detail( enrd_id, crs_id, mem_id, enrd_stat ) VALUES( enrd_seq.NEXTVAL, #{courseId}, #{id}, '신청' )
mapper.update: UPDATE ktds17b.enrollment_detail SET enrd_stat = '취소요청' WHERE mem_id = #{memberId} and crs_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT E.enrd_id as enrd_id, E.enrd_stat as enrd_stat, E.enrd_complete_date as enrd_complete_date, E.crs_id as crs_id, SUBSTR(C.crs_start_date,1,10) as crs_start_date, SUBSTR(C.crs_end_date,1,10) as crs_end_date, C.crs_classroom as crs_classroom, S.slb_id as slb_id, S.slb_name as slb_name, S.slb_type as slb_type, S.slb_time as slb_time, N.stf_id as stf_id, N.stf_state as stf_state, N.stf_url as stf_url FROM ktds17b.enrollment_detail E INNER JOIN ktds17b.course C on E.crs_id = C.crs_id INNER JOIN ktds17b.syllabus S on C.slb_id = S.slb_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ktds17b.satisfaction N on N.crs_id = C.crs_id WHERE mem_id = #{id} ORDER BY crs_start_date, crs_end_date
